Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,903Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Or maybe you don’t, since it was mostly death happening to you.”Jason still has months of training to go before he can return to Gotham and set all his plans in motion, but some kind of time-traveling or dimension-hopping Dick Grayson shows up to make it all about him, because of course he does.

entry.summary:
Author: Nyx_dreamy

His hate for Bruce is too strong and he do not feel welcome in their perfect little family. or Everyone is dealing with things and their family is slowly falling appart. Would they succeed to all get along and get over the mistakes of the past?

entry.title: i once was blind but now i see
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,652Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 232

Summary: At school, they were taught that Guides were gentle. Nurturing. Made to soothe their Sentinels, to ground them, to serve. They weren’t fighters. They weren’t strong. They posed no threat. The League taught Jason the truth. Few things in the world were more dangerous—or more terrifying—than a Guide. Because a true Empath didn’t need to lift a weapon to destroy you. They only had to feel you—deep enough, long enough—and they could take you apart from the inside out. Or: Having grown up on the streets, Jason thought he already understood the depths of human suffering. But awakening as a Guide shattered that illusion—because knowing pain was one thing. Feeling it, in all its raw, unfiltered truth from everyone around him, was something else entirely.

entry.title: Get My Pretty Name Outta Your Mouth
entry.summary:
Author: Reckoning1187

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,376Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Nightwing died. No one wanted to believe it. But Jason had been put in the ground only a year before, and no one could deny it. The family was broken; Bruce threw himself into work, Tim left the manor, Damien went rogue, and Alfred– he just tried to keep everything from falling apart more than it already had.Months later, Dick Grayson woke up in a small hospital in Central City, alone, with nothing to his name, and no memory of ever being Robin or Nightwing. With no family and no calling, Dick followed the only lead to his past– Gotham City. And… the Red Hood? OrMy need to tell an atrociously-hurt/wonderfully-comfort fic about Jason being a traumatized and dangerous mafia boss, and Dick being a confused, traumatized, and yet wonderfully-powerful crime-boss-in-training. And then make them kiss.  :)

entry.title: My days are layed with fire
entry.summary:
Author: argentiswomb

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,059Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: Once out of Jason's reach, Dick slumped against the wall, bringing a hand to his face as he exhaled deeply. It was becoming increasingly difficult to maintain that carefree atmosphere. He felt his control slowly slipping away every time they interacted, his affection seeping out and ruining every second he spoke to Jason. He had to stop, but he didn't know how. His wings slowly gathered around his body, enveloping him as he allowed himself a moment or two to calm his nervous system. He would have to do something about it, and quickly, if he didn't want to be thrown out of Jason's life in the blink of an eye.Or: five times in which Dick finds himself being cradled by Jason's wings and panics, plus once in which he doesn't.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,746Chapters: 15/50Kudos: 136

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: False Front
entry.summary:
Author: SaviouroftheStars

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 255,695Chapters: 29/35Kudos: 775

Summary: Dick Grayson is an undercover agent, tasked with infiltrating the Red Hoods, a dangerous new gang with a strict code of ethics. Posing as Ricky Kelly, a former sex worker with a fabricated past, Dick is sent to gain the trust of their leader, the mysterious and unpredictable Red Hood. As he works his way deeper into the gang, Dick quickly realizes that the Red Hoods are unlike any other criminal organization he’s encountered—disciplined, strategic, and governed by a unique moral code.But things become complicated when Dick finds himself developing feelings for their enigmatic leader and growing closer with the people he was sent to deceive.

entry.title: Glass Rain
entry.summary:
Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,161Chapters: 19/42Kudos: 846

Summary: Jason Todd wakes up in the wrong Gotham.Here, he stayed dead. Here, his death broke his family so completely they became the monsters they once fought. Dick Grayson haunts the skyline with wings and talons, Barbara Gordon moves like a spider made of shadow, and something that might have once been Batman rules from a corrupted cave.The city is quarantined, the air tastes of ozone and old blood, and Jason should be running.Instead, he finds himself drawn to the creature that was once his brother—the one stalking him through twisted streets with eyes that still burn with something almost human.Some hunts, it turns out, go both ways.
